name: oval-charm
short_effect: Doubles the chance of two Pokémon producing an egg at the daycare every 255 steps.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An oval charm said to increase the chance of Pokémon Eggs being found at the Nursery.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An oval charm said to increase the chance of Pokémon Eggs being found at the Nursery.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: An oval charm said to increase the chance of Pokémon Eggs being found at the Nursery.
